CustomField.description:
Retool Campaign ID. Intended to be a hidden field used on our Demo Form, which is populated by our website. The Retool Campaign ID is tied to SFDC Campaigns.
In Systems Use: 'Moment: Before Save Automations'; 'Task - After Save Automations'
External Systems Utilization: Hubspot
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Retool Campaign ID. Intended to be a hidden field used on our Demo Form, which is populated by our website. The Retool Campaign ID is tied to SFDC Campaigns.
CustomField.label: rcid
